EmailTemplate.name: Document Created
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Document {!Document__c.Name} requires your attention.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Document__c.Contact__c},
Please note that your document {!Document__c.Name} has been created and a file has been uploaded.
Click {!Document__c.Link} to view the Document in Salesforce.
Kind Regards,
The Salesforce Team
